Declaration
This declaration is to inform that in the preparation of this document, the details of the property in the document, 1B of the land, coffees, link documents, and tax receipts for the places / houses, details of the parties in the link document, addresses of the parties, photos of the parties, details of the property etc., I / We have thoroughly examined and prepared this deed and have included it in this deed.
No matter that should have been written or included has been omitted in this deed. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the deed has been written.
Except for the sale of the said property to you, no other sale, mortgage etc. has been made to anyone till now and that this property is undisputed property and that there are no dues payable on the said property and that we will be able to pay the depreciation stamp found during the inspection of the said property by the authorities (Registration & Stamps Revenue Department) in the future.
I/We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-B of the Registration Act -- 1908.
Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the Registrar of Deeds has any connection with this. We shall be responsible for any and all such matters that may arise in the future if it is found that the property sold is not Government, Endowment, Court or Assigned. This is a declaration that we have read this document completely and have had it read to us. VILL/COL: NALAKADODDI/NALAKADODDI W-B: 0-0 SURVEY: 404 EXTENT: .4 Acres Boundires: [N]: GUVA ERANNA LAND [S] DABBALA DUGENNA LAND [E]: ROAD [W]: MASTHAN LAND

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No 82 of 2023 dated 10/Jan/2023, executed by B.P Eranna, in favour of Basapuram Mangamma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 97.02 Sq. Yds., comprised in survey number 404, situated in Nalakadoddi Village and Gramapanchayat, Pattikonda Mandal, within the District of Kurnool, registered at sub-registrar office Aspari is bounded as follows: North by: Guva Eranna Land South by: Dabbala Dugenna Land East by: Road West by: Mastan Land
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
